# Status command shows skill state.

mkdir workspace
cd workspace
exec skv init

exec git -C skillrepo -c init.defaultBranch=main init
exec git -C skillrepo add .
exec git -C skillrepo commit -m add-skill

exec skv add file://$WORK/workspace/skillrepo:skill-foo --quiet

# Expected: status shows ok for synced skill
exec skv status
stdout 'skill-foo'
stdout 'ok'

# Modify vendored content to simulate drift
cp modified.txt .skv/skills/skill-foo/modified.txt

# Expected: status shows modified
exec skv status
stdout 'skill-foo'
stdout 'modified'

-- workspace/skillrepo/skill-foo/SKILL.md --
---
name: skill-foo
description: demo skill
---
-- workspace/modified.txt --
local modification
